home.heroDesc: Identify plant diseases instantly using advanced computer vision. Agrovision provides accurate, fast diagnostics to ensure your crops thrive and your yields maximize.
home.featuresDesc: We combine decades of botanical research with cutting-edge neural networks to provide the most reliable diagnostics on the market.
home.aiPrecisionDesc: Our models are trained on over 2 million labeled images of crop diseases with 99.4% field accuracy.
home.instantDiagnosticsDesc: Upload a photo and get a detailed health report including treatment suggestions in under 3 seconds.
home.globalReachDesc: Full native support for English and Azerbaijani, including local crop varieties and regional disease strains.
home.ctaTitle: Ready to secure your next harvest?
home.ctaDesc: Join the thousands of smart farmers using Agrovision to detect issues before they spread. Start your first analysis today for free.

features.title: Intelligent Technology for
features.intro: Agrovision leverages advanced neural networks and orbital satellite data to detect diseases before they spread, providing actionable recovery plans for farmers worldwide.
features.instantDesc: Identify plant stressors in seconds. Our AI analyzes photos to pinpoint infections, nutrient deficiencies, and pests.
features.recoveryDesc: Get precise recommendations. Whether you prefer organic solutions or chemical treatments, we provide the right cure.
features.expertDesc: Access a global network of agronomists and experienced farmers. Share images and get verified professional advice.
features.satelliteDesc: Monitor vast fields using NDVI indexing and high-res satellite imagery to spot invisible threats from space.
features.continuousDesc: Our AI is trained on over 5 million botanical data points, improving its accuracy with every scan.
features.encryptedDesc: Your field data and scan history are fully encrypted and private to your account.
features.realtimeDesc: Instant synchronization between your desktop dashboard and mobile scanner app.
features.fieldFirstDesc: Designed for low-light conditions and outdoor use.

analysis.analysisDesc: Leverage AI-driven computer vision to identify crop diseases instantly. Upload high-resolution photos for the best accuracy.
analysis.uploadImageDesc: Drag and drop your plant photo here or click to browse files. Supports JPEG, PNG (Max 10MB).
analysis.aiPoweredBy: AI Analysis powered by Agrovision Core™
analysis.fastDetectionDesc: Results in under 2 seconds using edge-computing AI models.
analysis.accuracy98Desc: Trained on over 2 million plant samples across 40+ species.
analysis.treatmentGuideDesc: Receive instant biological and chemical control suggestions.

gallery.title: Plant Disease Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Identify, treat, and prevent common plant ailments with our bilingual agricultural library.
gallery.searchPlaceholder: Search for a disease (e.g. Tomato Blight)...
gallery.highRiskDesc: Current season alert for Wheat Rust in your region. Check the latest diagnostic reports.
gallery.diseaseCardsPlaceholder: Disease cards will be displayed here

dashboard.criticalAlertDesc: Potato Late Blight detected in Section B (North Field). Treatment recommended within 24 hours.
dashboard.weeklyHealth: Weekly average health percentage across all sectors

contact.subtitle: Have questions about our plant disease detection tool? Our team of agricultural experts and developers are here to help you protect your crops.
